繎字的基本解释

繎
rán
深红色。
丝纠结难理。

繎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rán］
［《廣韻》如延切，平仙，日。］
深红色。

繎字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　繎； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页938第15
【廣韻】【集韻】?如延切，音然。【說文】絲勞也。　又【急就篇註】繎者，紅色之尤深，言若火之然也。　又【廣韻】而緣切【集韻】而宣切，?音堧。繎絲難理。　又【集韻】儒轉切。又人見切。義?同。

繎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
繎字的起名意思

暂无。

Xuan
rán
Crimson.
The silk is tangled and unmanageable.

[①] [rán]
["Guangyun" such as Yanqie, Pingxian, Day. ]
Crimson.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　繎; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 938 15
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Like Yanqie, the sound is natural. [Said the text] Silao also.　[Anxious to the post] The red is especially deep, and the words are like fire.　[Guangyun] and the edge cut [Jiyun] and Xuanqie,? Yin堧. Yunsi is difficult to deal with.　[Jiyun] Confucianists turn to cut. Everyone saw it again. Righteous? Same.
